title: Apple Maps Scraper
description: Scrape business listings from Apple Maps

searchQueries.title: Search Queries
searchQueries.description: List of search queries (e.g., 'pizza new york', 'coffee shop seattle')

maxResults.title: Max Results Per Query
maxResults.description: Maximum number of business listings to extract per search query

demoMode.title: Demo Mode
demoMode.description: Run with sample business data. Perfect for testing.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings - residential proxies recommended for Apple Maps

webhookUrl.title: Webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: URL to send results to (Zapier, Make, n8n, etc.)
webhookUrl.sectionDescription: Connect to Zapier, Make, n8n, or any webhook endpoint
